title: shiva perumAn
sahitya:
shiva perumAn krpai vENDum avan tiruvaruL pera vENDum vErenna vENDum


anupallavi

  avalap-pirappozhiya vENDum adarkuvittA avamAyai aghala vENDum vErenna vENDum


caraNam 1    tollulagil nArum ellaa uyirum shAnta
 sukha vAzhvu vAzha vENdum vErenna vENdum
  caraNam 2    kAma mudhl paghaiyum kurangu manamum shettu 
 rAmadAsan uyya vENdum vErenna vENdum
